price: Indeed, this is a reminder; so let anyone who wills may take a way to his Lord.
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦ تَذۡكِرَةٞۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
